Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth significantly more than its face value. I believe it could greatly benefit and enhance your life or work in numerous ways. Considering its high quality and versatility, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value I see in it for someone like you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can serve your needs. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
